objects.text: Boosts Hair Growth | Controls Hair Fall | Adds Strength & Shine

product_details.name: Mamaearth Onion Hair Oil with Onion Oil & Redensyl for Hair Fall Control | Boosts Hair Growth | Adds Strength & Shine | 200 ml
product_details.description: Country of Origin: India. Item part number: 8904417310245. Product Dimensions: 15.5 x 5 x 5 cm; 200 g. Item Weight: 200 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 15.5 x 5 x 5 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 200.0 millilitre. Generic Name: Hair Oil.

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, refreshing, and nature-inspired design showcasing a hair care product. The central focus is on the product image ("product_image"), placed against a dreamy green radial backdrop that feels calm and botanical. At the top, there's a bold, eye-catching heading ("heading") in deep green that emphasizes rejuvenation. Below it lies a stylish subheading ("subheading") in classic serif font that communicates the benefit-oriented message. Additional descriptive text ("description") provides quick value propositions. The pricing ("price") is prominently placed in green, signaling affordability, and the call-to-action ("cta") rests inside a rounded brown rectangle ("cta_background") for contrast and visibility.

**Color Palette:**
- Leaf Green (#46813a)
- Forest Green (#81c06f)
- Light Mint (#f0f8f0)
- Deep Brown (#673a2b)
- Crisp White (#FFFFFF)
- Radial Gradient: Light Green to Forest Green (#a8d5a2 → #81c06f)
product_color: The product image of Mamaearth Onion Hair Oil utilizes a fresh and vibrant color palette to emphasize nature-centric and health-conscious branding. Dominant colors include a rich **burgundy red (#7B1E3B)** from the onion imagery and label, representing the key ingredient and invoking strength and nourishment. A bright **spring green (#A4CF3F)** highlights a sense of natural elements and freshness, used effectively in the brand name and the lower section. The clean **white background (#FFFFFF)** enhances the overall clarity and lends a minimalistic appeal. Accents of **sky blue (#0078C1)** and **golden yellow (#EDC87B)** add richness and credibility. The harmonious blend helps highlight individual elements without overwhelming the viewer.
